page.title: 09SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: FOR SECONDARY AGE CHILDREN IN INVERCLYDE THE SCHOOL DAY STARTS AT 9am AND ENDS AT 3.40pm.SCHOOL UNIFORM IS STILL WORN IN MOST SCHOOLS.SUBJECTS STUDIED INCLUDE SCIENCE, MATHS, ART, FRENCH, TECHNICAL, ENGLISH, MUSIC, HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY, CLASSICAL STUDIES, MODERN STUDIES AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION. ALL PUPILS MUST STUDY MATHS, ENGLISH AND SCIENCE.SINCE CORPORAL PUNISHMENT WAS BANNED IN 1982 NEW SYSTEMS OF PUNISHMENT HAVE BEEN BROUGHT INTO USE. THE 'VOUCHER'SYSTEM AND DETENTION ARE THE MOST COMMONLY USED ONES. COMPUTERS ARE PLAYING AN INCREASINGLY IMPORTANT PART IN EDUCATION IN OUR SCHOOLS. SCHOOLS IN THIS AREA VARY CONSIDERABLY IN SIZE - GOUROCK HIGH SCHOOL HAS ABOUT 600 PUPILS BUT ST. COLUMBAS HIGH HAS OVER 1000.
